subject: Cancer
College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Matt Hahn, an assistant men’s basketball coach with Vermont, which faces Syracuse on Friday, and Evan Fjeld, a player, draw on family members’ battles with cancer for strength and focus.
snippet: Matt Hahn, an assistant men’s basketball coach with Vermont, which faces Syracuse on Friday, and Evan Fjeld, a player, draw on family members’ battles with cancer for strength and focus.
